videos.description: Tywhon Pickford drills the 3-pointer off the dish from Juwan McCloud.
videos.headline: Northern Iowa shows off ball movement; connects on 3-pointer

videos.description: NC State's Markell Johnson drives to the hoop and gets bumped, but still finishes for the and-1 layup.
videos.headline: Johnson absorbs the contact for the and-1

videos.description: Allerik Freeman drives to the hoop and avoids the charge, converting the layup and drawing a foul.
videos.headline: Freeman's and-1 drive puts NC State ahead

videos.description: Northern Iowa's Klint Carlson drives for layup and gives them a 62-58 lead.
videos.headline: Carlson's drive gives Panthers four point lead late
